creator: LOUD srl
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to explore the world with Balloon?

Save and keep track of the countries and states you've already visited, update your travel diary and read useful and essential information for your next trip.

Get inspired and discover new and fantastic places with always updated and handy tips.

Challenge your friends and share your latest trips on social networks.

FEATURES:

- 196 countries and more than 20,000 useful information to visit them
- Tips based on your preferences
- Travel diary to track and collect all the places where you've been
- Global ranking to compete with all the travelers on the app
- Profile and map of your travels to envy your friends


TRAVEL COUNTRIES TIPS:

- Currency converter exchange
- Anthem of the nation
- Spoken languages
- Emergency numbers
- UNESCO heritage
- Starred restaurants
- Level of risk
- National holiday
- Driving direction
- Currency of the country
and many other travel infos.


ALL CURRENCIES

Available conversions on Balloon are: USD (US Dollar), EUR (Euro), JPY (Japanese Yen), BGN (Bulgarian Lev), CZK (Czech Krona), DKK (Danish Krona), GBP (British Pound), HUF (Hungarian Forint) ), PLN (Polish Zloty), RON (Romanian Leu), SEK (Swedish Krona), CHF (Swiss Franc), ISK (Icelandic Krona), NOK (Norwegian Krone), HRK (Croatian Kuna), RUB (Russian Ruble), TRY (Turkish Lira), AUD (Australian Dollar), BRL (Brazilian Real), CAD (Canadian Dollar), CNY (Chinese Yuan), HKD (Hong Kong Dollar), IDR (Indonesian Rupee), ILS (New Israeli Shekel), INR (Indian Rupee), KRW (South Korean Won), MXN (Mexican Peso), MYR (Malaysian Ringgit), NZD (New Zealand Dollar), PHP (Philippine Peso), SGD (Singapore Dollar), THB (Thai Bath), ZAR ( South African Rand).

Do you love to travel? join Balloon now, download the app and get inspired.

creator: LOUD srl
descriptionHtml:
Get the list of visited countries and places where you have been. Track how many percent of the world have you visited. Create your own travel map with the countries and states you've been to. Update your travel diary and read useful and essential information for your next trip, like the UNESCO heritage. Challenge your friends and share your latest trips on Instagram and Facebook.

USER FRIENDLY FEATURES:
- 196 countries and more than 20,000 useful information to visit them
- Tips based on your preferences
- Travel diary to track and collect all the places where you've been
- Global ranking to compete with all the travelers on the app

- UNESCO heritage (World Heritage Sites)
- Starred restaurants
- Level of risk
- National holiday
- Driving direction
- Currency of the country
and many other travel infos.


ALL THE CURRENCIES OF THE SUPPORTED COUNTRIES:
Available conversions on Balloon are: USD (US Dollar), EUR (Euro), JPY (Japanese Yen), BGN (Bulgarian Lev), CZK (Czech Krona), DKK (Danish Krona), GBP (British Pound), HUF (Hungarian Forint) ), PLN (Polish Zloty), RON (Romanian Leu), SEK (Swedish Krona), CHF (Swiss Franc), ISK (Icelandic Krona), NOK (Norwegian Krone), HRK (Croatian Kuna), RUB (Russian Ruble), TRY (Turkish Lira), AUD (Australian Dollar), BRL (Brazilian Real), CAD (Canadian Dollar), CNY (Chinese Yuan), HKD (Hong Kong Dollar), IDR (Indonesian Rupee), ILS (New Israeli Shekel), INR (Indian Rupee), KRW (South Korean Won), MXN (Mexican Peso), MYR (Malaysian Ringgit), NZD (New Zealand Dollar), PHP (Philippine Peso), SGD (Singapore Dollar), THB (Thai Bath), ZAR ( South African Rand).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are thrilled to announce that our iOS app has just gotten even better! We have added 11 new countries to our list, making it easier for you to explore the world and discover new places. Whether you're planning a vacation or simply want to satisfy your wanderlust, our app now offers even more destinations for you to choose from.
